Description:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException when preview attached report in excel.
Build number:2.2.1.v200707271405

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview attached report in excel.

Expected result:
Preview is ok.

Actual result:
Preview is ok for all formats except for excel.
